mapper.select: select TERMS_NUM, TO_CHAR(TERMS_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGDATE, TERMS_TITLE, TERMS_CONTENT from TERMS

select TERMS_NUM, TO_CHAR(TERMS_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGDATE, TERMS_TITLE, TERMS_CONTENT
FROM TERMS WHERE TERMS_NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TERMS ( TERMS_NUM, TERMS_TITLE, TERMS_CONTENT, TERMS_REGDATE ) VALUES ( TERMS_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{TERMS_TITLE}, #{TERMS_CONTENT}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TERMS SET TERMS_TITLE = #{TERMS_TITLE}, TERMS_CONTENT = #{TERMS_CONTENT}, TERMS_REGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE TERMS_NUM = #{num}
